--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Unicron:
> 
> "Use the predacons against them, they are working together to destroy
> 
> us... but the old wounds still are flesh"

OOC: What old wounds do the Maximas and the Predicons have? Yeah I know
there is the old hatreds, but except what is happening now with Hydras
what have the two overall factions been doing here on earth?? Have
there been any real sustained conflicts?? It looks to me like both
sides pretty don't fight much as they are both looking over thier
shoulders waiting on Unicron to attack. You may have a skirmish, but I
have not really seen any attacks from the preds on the maxi's. 

Infact, why are the Maximals and Predicons here on earth? and what do
they hope to accomplish? I would assume the Preds came for some dark
purpose and the Maximals came to protect?? but from what??

Help! 

These questions may be answered elswhere, and I apologize of they are,
but any help would be greatly appreciated. :)

Tanks
Preston
